News.Title: Golden Tobacco Limited Appoints Mrs. Nisha Mittal as Company Secretary cum Compliance Officer
News.Summary: Golden Tobacco Limited appointed Mrs. Nisha Mittal as Company Secretary cum Compliance Officer effective from 17th June 2025. Mrs. Mittal is an associate member of the Institute of Company Secretaries of India with membership number A49595. She holds an LLB from CCS University and B.Com from Delhi University. Her appointment term runs from 17th June 2025 until termination. The appointment was made to comply with Section 203 of the Companies Act 2013 and SEBI listing regulations.
